DFRobotWiFiIoTI2C.ThingSpeakSend|block: ThingSpeak 发送 值1:%field1||值2:%field2|值3:%field3|值4:%field4|值5:%field5|值6:%field6|值7:%field7 值8:%field8
DFRobotWiFiIoTI2C.httpPost|block: http(post) | url %url| content %content| 超时(毫秒) %time
DFRobotWiFiIoTI2C.httpPut|block: http(put) | url %url| content %content| 超时(毫秒) %time
DFRobotWiFiIoTI2C.httpSetup|block: 配置 http ip: %IP port: %PORT 开始连接
